attributes.action: introduce proportional representation before the next election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in order that all future winning parties are determined by every vote cast and not every seat won.  This way, there will no longer be the need for tactical voting and the system will be fair, in contrast to the present first-past-the-post system.  The outcome of any election would also accurately reflect the national mood and give the minority parties a greater voice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
